text:
e="preserve">"Hot Shots Golf", know in Japan as, and known as "Everybody's Golf" in PAL regions, is a golf video game series. It was published by Sony Computer Entertainment and developed by Camelot Sofware & Clap Handz. It was designed for the PlayStation video game consoles.
The seven main games were released between 1997 and 2017 for every Playstation home console. The series has had games for the PlayStation, PlayStation 2, PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4, PlayStation Portable and the PlayStation Vita.
